title: This Vitamin Completes Me
author: Joseph
citation: Joseph. "This Vitamin Completes Me: experience with Vitamin C (ID 68111)". Erowid.org. Jan 3, 2008. erowid.org/exp/68111
report: This morning I was feeling a little bit sick. Nothing serious, just some coughing and a runny nose. I took one Vitamin C pill and now I feel fine.
